[h1]То чувство, когда перестал пиратить Халфу, чисто чтобы поиграть в технодемку[/h1]

[h1]Но остался доволен, ибо даже технодемка от вэлвов является шедевром[/h1]

А если серьезно, перед нами вырезанный кусок одной из глав второй Халфы, что должен был быть в игре, но не сложилось, не сраслось, и вместо того чтобы засунуть кусок уровня обратно, его сделали отдельным, для демонстрации HDR, блума и прочего такой осветительной фигни

Do you like the source engine? Do you like learning about HDR and how valve uses it in their games? Do you like hearing the sweet voice of Lord GabeN? Well youve come to the right place, this entire "game" or shall i say tech demo is fun and interesting to learn about how the source engine uses HDR in their games, also its probably the best tech demo i've seen or played because it has "some what" of a story to it and as a plus, YOU LEARN YAY!, out of ten i'll give it a ten because as a tech demo it does it's job well. As a game however a 5 I think it deserves that.

It's Short,Fun and it's half-life the end

Half-Life 2 Lost Coast is a short demo originally released to showcase and demonstrate the new capabilities of the updated Source engine, primarily its High Dynamic Range (HDR) feature. If you're expecting a long, exciting new addition to the Half-Life saga, you'll be disappointed. Originally meant to be a part of the chapter Highway 17 in the main Half-Life 2 release, this ride will last you about ten minutes. 
Don't get me wrong, although it's non-canon and very basic, it retains one shining quality: it's still Half-Life. I'd recommend this to anyone who considers themselves a big fan of the series, just not to the gaming community in general. This was Valve's first "game" to include the commentary nodes, and these are very interesting, as always. 
There's nothing here that Half-Life 2 (and its respective episodes) can't do already, so I'd advise anyone curious about this series to play those first.
Great game. An all time classics!

Lost Coast is basically a tech-demo disguised as a game, therefore it offers nice graphics and location at cost of only one level. Unless you want to see the beauty of the game (or get props for Garry's Mod), there's nothing much to see here.

Ok so this is a short 15 - 20min tech demo by valve showing off HDR lighting (which is a light effect which recreates how to human eye reacts to bright lights and dark environments.

The level itself is really fun and pretty and for me has alot of replay ability. If this level was in base game hl2 it would 100% be my favourite level and for sure be one of the most memorable parts.

[b] [b] [h1] 하프라이프2 체험판  [/h1] [/b] [/b]

[공식 한글화]
독창성: ★ ★ ★ ★ ☆     [하프라이프를 제대로 담아냄]
그래픽: ★ ★ ★ ★ ☆     [눈호강은 할 수 있음]
사운드: ★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆     [애매함]
스토리: ★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆     [세계관은 제대로 표현 다만 짧음]
플레이타임: ★ ★ ☆ ☆ ☆     [~30분 정도의 플레이타임] 
레벨디자인: ★ ★ ★ ★ ☆     [제대로 체험할 수 있는 환경을 제공]
조작감: ★ ★ ★ ☆ ☆     [여전함]

하프라이프2가 어떤 게임인가를 제대로 압축해서 보여준 기술 시연용 체험판입니다.
원래는 하프라이프2 에피소드 시리즈의 그래픽 소스엔진 신기술 HDR 시연용으로 만들어진 게임입니다
그래서 그런지 그래픽이 현재 기준으로는 좋은편이 아님에도 눈호강 할 수 있는 부분을 많이 만들어둔 편입니다.
다만 오로지 기술 시연용으로 만들어서 그런지 그외 요소는 많이 등한시 되었습니다.
그래도 공짜로 주는 만큼 한번 플레이해보실 가치는 있다고 봅니다.

Изначально планировавшийся как раздел главы Шоссе-17 игры Half-Life 2, Lost Coast оказался играбельным технологическим образцом, демонстрирующим добавление динамического освещения HDR в движок Source.
una prueba de motor simplemente... probando el HDR xD
Да.

Half-Life 2: Loast Coast è un "livello" che inizialmente doveva far parte del capitolo "Autostrada 17", ma poi hanno deciso di prendere questo livello come "test" per, appunto, testare L'illuminazione HDR (High Dynamic Range). Per qualche motivo la Valve ha deciso d'inserire questo progetto su Steam come "vetrina giocabile", probabilmente per condividere con gli utenti quello che sarebbe stato Half-Life 2 Sviluppato con L'HDR. Il livello dura decisamente poco e ci sono abbastanza nemici per farsi quattro spari, ma ovviamente non è quello lo scopo del progetto. Quando avvieremo il livello ci verrà chiesto se vogliamo attivare i commenti degli sviluppatori per conoscere bene la storia di questo progetto e farci spiegare come lo hanno sviluppato. Ovviamente non posso dare un voto dato che questo non è un gioco vero e proprio.
